name: Commissioned Crews
desc:
Commission bonuses are always applied when you enter a market. 

However... as a last resort, when activated, this ship will receive special training or upgrades varying from the faction you're commissioned under.

name: Commissioned Crew Ban
desc: This ship will be marked to never accept any future Commission Bonus for any reason.
short: Deattach the ship's hull with the commissioned crew first!

name: Hegemony Armor Improvements
desc: The ship is outfitted with high-quality armor plating produced in the forges of Chicomoztoc, increases ship's armor by %s/%s/%s/%s points, depending on hull size. Armor designs such as the XIV Battlegroup's designs receive a reduced armor bonus of %s.

name: Patriotic Fighters
desc: Ship's crews are bolstered in patriotism, lowering the replacement time of fighters by %s/%s/%s/%s, depending on hull size. The morale boost also makes the ship require less crew to operate, lowering skeleton crew requirement by %s.

name: Advanced Flux Capacitors
desc: Ship with built-in permanent hullmods that are acquired from story points have an increased flux capacity of %s/%s/%s/%s and an increased flux dissipation of %s/%s/%s/%s, depending on hull size.

name: Lion Training
desc: The ship's crews have been trained and constantly drilled on Sindrian doctrines. Receive additional bonuses when an Officer is on-board this ship. Increase the ship's maneuverability by %s.

name: Pirate Handiworks
desc: Pirates and smugglers on-board makes constant adjustments to make the ship less visible in space. The ship's sensor profile is reduced by %s.

name: Luddic Rituals
desc: Each missile has been made with utermost care and blessed by priests of the Luddic Church to destroy their enemies. Confers %s missile health and %s damage dealt by missile weapons.

name: Path's Vision
desc: Pathers have performed modifications to the ship's engines, increasing ship's top speed by %s/%s/%s/%s su/second, depending on hull size. Minor modifications to other systems have also been done, reducing the rate at which combat readiness degrades by %s.

name: United We Stand
desc:
When your commissioned faction or yourself is allied in an alliance, receive all of its respective Commissioned Bonus.

"Then join hand in hand, brave Perseans all, by uniting we stand, by dividing we fall. In so righteous a cause let us hope to succeed and let none that oppose us stand in our way."

name: Alliance Sensor Array
desc: Applies all United We Stand hull mod to all eligible ships! Will auto-remove itself upon using.

name: United We Stand
desc:
When your commissioned faction or yourself is allied in an alliance, receive all of its respective Commissioned Bonus.

"Then join hand in hand, brave Perseans all, by uniting we stand, by dividing we fall. In so righteous a cause let us hope to succeed and let none that oppose us stand in our way."
